audioText: Mes amis comptent venir à la fête samedi.
question: Mes amis ______ venir à la fête samedi.
explanation: The text states 'Mes amis comptent venir à la fête samedi' - My friends are planning to come to the party on Saturday. The correct form is 'comptent' (3rd person plural of 'compter') to agree with the plural subject 'mes amis'.
